p: A. indica and A. aspera extracts with MICs ranging from 25.0 ± 0.0 mg/mL to 100.0 ± 0.0 mg/mL, and 50.0 ± 0.0 to 200.0 ± 0.0 mg/mL, respectively, had moderate to low activity against the tested bacterial strains. Even though A. indica exhibited moderate to low activity against the tested strains, it showed bactericidal activity against all tested strains, with MBC values ≥200 mg/mL against all tested strains except S. aureus and Streptococcus pyogenes isolates.
